languages.text: "Хейнрикс, я думал{mf||а}, мы друзья. Но друзья не вламываются с оружием в покои посреди ночи, не так ли?"

traits.locale_text: "Хейнрикс, я думал, мы друзья. Но друзья не вламываются с оружием в покои посреди ночи, не так ли?"

languages.text: "Heinrix, I thought we were friends. But friends don't break into each other's chambers in the middle of the night with weapons, do they?"
languages.original_text: "Хейнрикс, я думал{mf||а}, мы друзья. Но друзья не вламываются с оружием в покои посреди ночи, не так ли?"

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix, I thought we were friends. But friends don't break into each other's chambers in the middle of the night with weapons, do they?"
"Heinrix, I thought we were friends. But friends don't break into each other's chambers in the middle of the night with weapons, do they?"
"Heinrix, I thought we were friends. But friends don't break into each other's chambers in the middle of the night with weapons, do they?"
"Heinrix, I thought we were friends. But friends don't break into each other's chambers in the middle of the night with weapons, do they?"
"Heinrix, I thought we were friends. But friends don't break into each other's chambers in the middle of the night with weapons, do they?"

languages.text: 「ハインリックス、私達は友だ。だが、友というのは武器を持って真夜中に互いの部屋へ侵入するものではないだろう」
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, I thought we were friends. But friends don't break into each other's chambers in the middle of the night with weapons, do they?"

traits.locale_text: 「ハインリックス、私達は友だ。だが、友というのは武器を持って真夜中に互いの部屋へ侵入するものではないだろう」

languages.text: “海因里希，我本以为我们是朋友，可朋友绝不会大半夜拿着武器，硬闯进对方的房间，没错吧？”
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, I thought we were friends. But friends don't break into each other's chambers in the middle of the night with weapons, do they?"

traits.locale_text: “海因里希，我本以为我们是朋友，可朋友绝不会大半夜拿着武器，硬闯进对方的房间，没错吧？”

languages.text: «Heinrix, pensaba que éramos amigos. Pero los amigos no irrumpen en los aposentos de sus amigos arma en ristre, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, I thought we were friends. But friends don't break into each other's chambers in the middle of the night with weapons, do they?"

traits.locale_text: «Heinrix, pensaba que éramos amigos. Pero los amigos no irrumpen en los aposentos de sus amigos arma en ristre, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: « Heinrix, je nous croyais amis, mais les amis ne s'introduisent pas chez les autres par effraction au beau milieu de la nuit, et armés de sucroît. »
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, I thought we were friends. But friends don't break into each other's chambers in the middle of the night with weapons, do they?"

traits.locale_text: « Heinrix, je nous croyais amis, mais les amis ne s'introduisent pas chez les autres par effraction au beau milieu de la nuit, et armés de sucroît. »

languages.text: "Heinrix, ich dachte, wir wären Freunde. Aber Freunde brechen nicht nächtens und bewaffnet beieinander ein, oder?"
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, I thought we were friends. But friends don't break into each other's chambers in the middle of the night with weapons, do they?"

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix, ich dachte, wir wären Freunde. Aber Freunde brechen nicht nächtens und bewaffnet beieinander ein, oder?"

languages.text: "Heinrix, dost olduğumuzu sanıyordum. Dostlar gecenin bir yarısı silahlanıp birbirlerinin odasına zorla dalmazlar, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, I thought we were friends. But friends don't break into each other's chambers in the middle of the night with weapons, do they?"

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix, dost olduğumuzu sanıyordum ama dostlar gecenin bir yarısı silahlanıp birbirlerinin odasına zorla dalmazlar, değil mi?"
